name: Hentai Puzzle Logic Game
detailed_description:
ATTENTION: The game is not recommended for teens under 16 years old.

Hentai Puzzle Logic Game - this is a logical game that consists of a frame of square tiles in random order with one tile missing. The object of the puzzle is to place the tiles in order by making sliding moves that use the empty space. Solve the puzzle and get the opportunity to see the most beautiful parts of bodies of girls.

Hentai Puzzle Logic Game FEATURES:

  • Frank atworks;
  • 20 different levels;
  • Art - gallery;
  • Steam achievements;
  • Trading cards ;
  • Seхy backgrounds
.
